caption.p: Chromatogram obtained by HPLC/APCI-MS/MS in positive mode from the microalgae Selenastrum bibraianum. 1 = trans-lutein; 2 = astaxanthin; IS = internal standard; 3 = cis-lutein; 4 = cryptoxanthin; 5 = α-carotene; β-carotene and canthaxanthin ester; 6 = fucoxanthin ester and canthaxanthin ester.
